data.eml:eml: A new species of Palpita (Crambidae, Spilomelinae) from the coastal plains of southeastern United States

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sullivan, J. Bolling, Solis, M. Alma (2013): A new species of Palpita (Crambidae, Spilomelinae) from the coastal plains of southeastern United States. ZooKeys 264: 3-9, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.264.4363, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.264.4363
